committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Financial Institutions Supervision, Regulation and Deposit Insurance

official_title: To extend the statute of limitations applicable to civil actions brought by the Federal conservator or receiver of a failed depository institution.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act and the Federal Credit Union Act to extend from three to five years the statute of limitations for civil actions brought by a Federal conservator or receiver of a failed depository institution.

titles.title: To extend the statute of limitations applicable to civil actions brought by the Federal conservator or receiver of a failed depository institution.
